## Ejemplo de ggdark

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggdark)
mtcars %>% 
  ggplot(aes(mpg,cyl))+
  geom_point()+
  geom_smooth(method = "lm")
```

## Ejemplo de ggdark

```{r}
mtcars %>% 
  ggplot(aes(mpg,cyl))+
  geom_point()+
  geom_smooth(method = "lm")+
  dark_theme_bw()
```
